arts.ttl: Niall Ennis’ brace helps Blackpool snap home draw streak
arts.sum: The Seasiders won 3-1 against Crawley despite playing more than an hour with 10 men following Ashley Fletcher’s red card.

Blackpool's incredible sequence of draws continued against Mansfield last weekend as they came from 3-1 behind to claim an eighth in their last 10 league fixtures. The Seasiders have lost just once i...
